name: Chicken Borscht
author: FIRESTALKER
summary: A hearty borscht that makes a great meal. Serve with some crusty bread. And the leftovers are even better the next day.
ingredients: 2 pounds potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 inch cubes
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place chicken thighs in the chicken stock in a large pot
Bring to a boil over medium heat, cover, and simmer until the chicken thighs are no longer pink at the bone, about 20 minutes
Remove chicken, and set aside to cool
Stir in the potatoes, tomatoes, beets, carrot, cabbage, onion, garlic, red wine vinegar, tomato paste, and bay leaf
Cover and simmer until the potatoes are tender, about 30 minutes
Meanwhile, chunk the chicken, and discard the bones
Return the chicken thighs to the soup, and simmer uncovered for 20 minutes
